name: Fading Memories (luongvy, loopmari, c-vaughan, Suraj Karthikeyan)
name_original: Fading Memories (luongvy, loopmari, c-vaughan, Suraj Karthikeyan)
description:
Fading Memories is a first-person narrative puzzle game where the player plays as a nurse that helps an old woman try and overcome her memory loss by completing tasks and taking care of her while uncovering more of her story.

Note: This game is a preproduction prototype made for the MI 455 course at MSU. It is intended to be a proof-of-concept of the experience goal. Due to time constraints, current gameplay is not solid and aesthetics style is not set in stone.

Preproduction Team

Zane O’Dell - Systems Programmer/Fungi

Suraj Karthikeyan - Systems Engineer/Producer

Vy Luong - Environment Designer/Animator

Christian Vaughan - Sound Designer

Marie Loop - 2D Artist/UI Designer
